amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress concerning the abuse of persons in custody in Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-499 to express the sense of Congress concerning the abuse of persons in custody in Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 4 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hunter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 4 (Roll no. 199).
